Skill.sDesc: able to perform basic maintenance on armor
able to perform basic maintenance on weapons
+1 to attack versus orcs, half orcs goblins and hobgoblins
see in the infra spectrum for 60ft.
Giants, trolls, ogres, ogre magi, and titans suffer -4 to hit dwarves

detect grade or slope in passage 1-5 on d6
detect new tunnel/passage construction 1-5 on d6
detect sliding/shifting walls or rooms 1-4 on d6
detect stonework traps, pits and deadfalls 1-3 on d6
determine approximate depth underground 1-3 on d6
20% chance for failure of magic item when using anything but weapons, armor, shields
